name: apart ment
description:
A character surrounded by depression tries to remain functional in a society that erases them. Energy and cash management influences events that happen inside their apartment.

Made for BIG MIX JAM 4DIVERSITY by:

  • Daniel Minoh Giampaulo
  • Ivan Garcia Filho
  • Jo Seraph
  • olmewe
  • Vivian Azevedo

How to Play

Space Bar interact , WASD or Arrows move , Mouse ou Mouse pad in Minigames
